nodes.text: In the year 0 ABY, a male gunman and his companion attempted to use their blasters to kill Emperor's Hand Mara Jade in order to protect Imperial Judge Lamos Chatoor. However, Jade killed him and his partner when she redirected their blaster bolts back at them with her lightsaber. Soon after, Jade killed Chatoor as well.
The male gunman first appeared in the 2011 novel Choices of One, written by Timothy Zahn.
